Array.*map: map an array with a callback
Array.*filter: filter an array by a value, regex, or function
Array.*at: returns the first index of an item matching a value, regex or function
Array.*add: Adds an item only if it doesn't exist
Array.*singles: returns an array with no duplictes
Array.*copy: returns a copy of the array
Array.*merge: merge an array into the array
Array.*contains: return true if an item contains a value that matches value, regex or function
Array.*all: returns whether all items match a value, regex or function
Array.*name: associates each item with a name to create an object or map items to an object based on matching data

Object.*map: map an object with a callback
Object.*filter: filter an object by a value, regex, or function
Object.*contains: return true if an item contains a value that matches value, regex or function
Object.array: removes naming and converts to an string
Object.merge: merge an array into the string
Object.copy: returns a copy of the string
Object.at: return the key name of the item that matches a value, regex or function
Object.*add: adds a key to the object of course only if it doesn't exist

String.contains: return true if an item contains a value that matches value, regex or function
String.int: the integer value of the string
String.dec: the floating/decimal value of the string
String.format: format a string with arguments or strings
String.copy: returns a copy of the string
String.at: return the index name of the item that matches a value, regex or function
String.test: test a string against a regex

Number.dec: the floating/decimal value of the number
Number.copy: returns a copy of the number
Number.test: test a string against a regex
